body:
Comment 3: 
more useful info:

https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!topic/golang-dev/MBNA-B4OF0k

$ cat k.go
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
        fields := make(map[string]int)
        fields["foo"] = len(fields)
        fmt.Printf("%+v\n", fields)
        fields = make(map[string]int)
        fields["foo"], fields["bar"], fields["baz"] = len(fields), len(fields), len(fields)
        fmt.Printf("%+v\n", fields)
        fields = make(map[string]int)
        fields["foo"], fields["foo"] = len(fields), len(fields)
        fmt.Printf("%+v\n", fields)
}

$ go run k.go
map[foo:0]
map[foo:0 bar:0 baz:0]
map[foo:0]

$ go run -compiler=gccgo k.go
map[foo:1]
map[baz:0 bar:0 foo:0]
map[foo:0]
